label: about
detail: Shows the short information about Composer.

label: archive
detail: Creates an archive of this composer package.

label: auto-scripts
detail: Runs the auto-scripts script as defined in composer.json.

label: browse
detail: Opens the package's repository URL or homepage in your browser.

label: check-platform-reqs
detail: Check that platform requirements are satisfied.

label: clear-cache
detail: Clears composer's internal package cache.

label: clearcache
detail: Clears composer's internal package cache.

label: config
detail: Sets config options.

label: create-project
detail: Creates new project from a package into given directory.

label: depends
detail: Shows which packages cause the given package to be installed.

label: diagnose
detail: Diagnoses the system to identify common errors.

label: dump-autoload
detail: Dumps the autoloader.

label: dump-env
detail: Compiles .env files to .env.local.php.

label: dumpautoload
detail: Dumps the autoloader.

label: exec
detail: Executes a vendored binary/script.

label: fix-recipes
detail: Installs or reinstalls recipes for already installed packages.

label: global
detail: Allows running commands in the global composer dir ($COMPOSER_HOME).

label: help
detail: Displays help for a command

label: home
detail: Opens the package's repository URL or homepage in your browser.

label: i
detail: Installs the project dependencies from the composer.lock file if present, or falls back on the composer.json.

label: info
detail: Shows information about packages.

label: init
detail: Creates a basic composer.json file in current directory.

label: install
detail: Installs the project dependencies from the composer.lock file if present, or falls back on the composer.json.

label: licenses
detail: Shows information about licenses of dependencies.

label: list
detail: Lists commands

label: outdated
detail: Shows a list of installed packages that have updates available, including their latest version.

label: prohibits
detail: Shows which packages prevent the given package from being installed.

label: recipes
detail: Shows information about all available recipes.

label: remove
detail: Removes a package from the require or require-dev.

label: require
detail: Adds required packages to your composer.json and installs them.

label: run
detail: Runs the scripts defined in composer.json.

label: run-script
detail: Runs the scripts defined in composer.json.

label: search
detail: Searches for packages.

label: self-update
detail: Updates composer.phar to the latest version.

label: selfupdate
detail: Updates composer.phar to the latest version.

label: show
detail: Shows information about packages.

label: status
detail: Shows a list of locally modified packages, for packages installed from source.

label: suggests
detail: Shows package suggestions.

label: sync-recipes
detail: Installs or reinstalls recipes for already installed packages.

label: u
detail: Upgrades your dependencies to the latest version according to composer.json, and updates the composer.lock file.

label: unpack
detail: Unpacks a Symfony pack.

label: update
detail: Upgrades your dependencies to the latest version according to composer.json, and updates the composer.lock file.

label: upgrade
detail: Upgrades your dependencies to the latest version according to composer.json, and updates the composer.lock file

label: validate
detail: Validates a composer.json and composer.lock.

label: why
detail: Shows which packages cause the given package to be installed.

label: why-not
detail: Shows which packages prevent the given package from being installed.

label: recipes:install
detail: Installs or reinstalls recipes for already installed packages.

label: symfony:dump-env
detail: Compiles .env files to .env.local.php.

label: symfony:generate-id
detail: Generates a unique ID for this project.

label: symfony:recipes
detail: Shows information about all available recipes.

label: symfony:recipes:install
detail: Installs or reinstalls recipes for already installed packages.

label: symfony:sync-recipes
detail: Installs or reinstalls recipes for already installed packages.

label: symfony:unpack
detail: Unpacks a Symfony pack.
